cobblextras.behaviour.trainer.name: Trainer
cobblextras.behaviour.trainer.desc: Allows an NPC to remember who it has battled and provides dialogue options for interacting with the player.
cobblextras.entity.variable.cannot_battl: The message to use when this trainer is unable to battle a player for any reason.
cobblextras.entity.variable.already_defe: The message to use when a player has already defeated this trainer.
cobblextras.entity.variable.interact_mes: The message to use when a player interacts with this trainer before a battle.
cobblextras.entity.variable.victory_mess: The message to use when this trainer defeats a player.
cobblextras.entity.variable.defeat_messa: The message to use when this trainer loses to a player.
cobblextras.entity.variable.battle_forma: What format to use for battles with this trainer.
